title: Frieren: Beyond Journey's End Season 2 Officially Announced!
content: The journey continues beyond the end. Studio Madhouse has officially confirmed that Frieren Season 2 is in production, covering the El Dorado arc.

title: Mushoku Tensei Season 3 Scheduled for July 2026!
content: Rudeus Greyrat's journey continues. The production committee has officially confirmed that the third season of the Isekai masterpiece will debut in the Summer 2026 season.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen: The Culling Game Part 1 - What to Expect
content: The Culling Game has begun. Yuji and Megumi enter the barriers in this high-stakes continuation.
